titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Canalway.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 7/23/2013--Introduced. Amends the Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Corridor Act of 1996 to extend through FY2022 the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to make grants or provide financial assistance for the Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Canalway in Ohio.
